pages.text: Scroll through the following pages to get relevant links for this mod
This contains the source code of the mod
A bug is something that makes the game act weirdly, but doesn't crash Minecraft.$(2br)Please don't open issues to add suggestions, we can't accept them for the time being.
Crashes are errors that make Minecraft close, not something that works weirdly.$(2br)Please don't open issues to add suggestions, we can't accept them for the time being.
Donations for now only help this mod grow more quickly, but in the future they will grant cosmetic rewards and unique textures.
